title: Revert to Version 59 and Fix Footer Settings Error

requirements.summary: Revert all frontend code changes to match Version 59 exactly, restoring the previous working state before Version 60 was deployed
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend code matches Version 59 state
Application functions as it did in Version 59
No Version 60 changes remain in the frontend codebase

file_operations.description: Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the main application component including routing, authentication flow, and admin panel rendering logic
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the hero section including layout, styling, effects integration, and content rendering
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the header component including navigation, authentication controls, and routing logic
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the footer component including content rendering, social media links, and admin editing capabilities
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the footer management interface including form handling, section reordering, and save functionality
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the content management interface
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the hero theme configuration interface
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of the admin panel container including tab navigation and manager component integration
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of React Query hooks including query definitions and mutation handlers
Revert all changes made in Version 60 to restore exact Version 59 state of hero theme utility functions

requirements.summary: Fix the error that appears when opening the footer settings in the admin panel
acceptanceCriteria: Footer settings tab in admin panel opens without errors
No console errors appear when accessing footer settings
All footer management functionality works correctly
FooterManager component renders and operates properly

file_operations.description: Debug and fix the error occurring when the footer settings tab is opened. Review component initialization, state management, data fetching hooks, and form field rendering to identify the root cause. Ensure all footer content properties are properly handled with null checks and default values. Fix any issues with array manipulation, drag-and-drop handlers, or mutation callbacks that may cause runtime errors

Review and fix the useFooterContent query hook to ensure it properly handles loading states, error states, and data transformations. Verify that the query returns data in the expected format for the FooterManager component and that all required fields are present with appropriate fallback values

Review footer content data consumption to ensure consistency with FooterManager expectations. Verify that the component properly handles all footer content properties and that any shared utilities or type definitions are correctly implemented
